fullData.title: Magic Bomb
fullData.description: There are only a few small balls at the beginning, and see who can rely on technology to make them more and more powerful! In the game, we need to continuously launch the balls to the positive wall, keep multiplying and grow the balls, and finally break through the house to reach the end, come and try it together!

fullData.title: Ice Escape
fullData.description: You are in an ice obstacle course! You need to overcome the obstacles on the way to surpass the opponent and reach the finish line smoothly to pass the level. Now lets challenge it together!

fullData.title: Human Tower
fullData.description: Players need to operate the character to perform multiple flips to avoid some obstacles as much as possible, strive for the tower to reach a higher height, and then continue to climb over obstacles and run to a beautiful end!

fullData.title: Hamster Run
fullData.description: A game that simulates hamster running, climb over many obstacles, successfully reach the end, and eat cheese.

fullData.title: Best Shooter
fullData.description: You are the best shooter.Players operate characters to collect more characters in the scene, reach the middle end and defeat the boss. If the same characters are adjacent to each other, they can synthesize more advanced characters, and they can also cultivate and upgrade characters through extraordinary openings and attributes!

fullData.title: Attack Hero
fullData.description: On the continent of Adom, there has always been an ancient demon Yuksa. As one of the five heroes, Parker stepped forward and sealed the ancient demon Yuksa, but Yuksa took advantage of the kings ambition to break the seal again. Invade the continent of Adom, and the young heroes are also ready to fight!

fullData.title: My Cat
fullData.description: There are hundreds of cats of various colors waiting for you to claim. By merging and upgrading, you can adopt super rare and super cute cats. After adopting, remember to take good care of the cat owner. In the cat apartment, you can get diamond rewards through daily tasks, and then you can buy various props to make the cat owner happy. Come and give them unique names and play with them together.

fullData.title: Magic Carpenter
fullData.description: Enjoy comfortable decompression, become a play woodworker and cut various kinds of wood by sliding the screen, and there are more interactive modes to enhance the players sense of substitution. Relax your body and mind, and combine with more unique experience to help you pass all kinds of boring time!

fullData.title: Island Survival
fullData.description: The players goal is to live on a desert island, upgrade and build their own island, and go deep into the blue sea to find treasures in the seabed.

fullData.title: Gravity Bowling
fullData.description: This is a different bowling game. This time, instead of throwing it with our hands, we smashed it with a rope. This is a very mentally challenged time. Lets play together.

fullData.title: Battle Burger
fullData.description: An auto chess game with food as the theme, recruiting different types to restrain the opposing lineup, there are tank-type burgers, shooter-type fries, magic remote-type pizza, etc., pay attention to adjusting your position to kill the enemy heroically Bar!

fullData.title: None Less
fullData.description: Your team is going on!Your goal is to get them all to the finish line.You will encounter various obstacles along the way, and it is crucial to avoid them in time.

fullData.title: My Home
fullData.description: This man wants to find his woman.There are many obstacles on the way.All you need to do is twitch the needle correctly and let the man pass smoothly.

fullData.title: Magic Worm
fullData.description: This is an amazing worm.Your goal is to get the bugs to crawl into the wormhole.Up, down, left and right can control the crawling direction of the bugs.Every time a bug eats an apple, it grows longer.

fullData.title: Lost In Lust
fullData.description: LIVE your stories with love, romance, adventure, and drama.LostInLust is an immense collection of interactive stories where YOU choose your destiny. Or become a creator and write your own!

fullData.title: Super Coaster
fullData.description: Swipe the screen to make a slide. The character in the game will slide according to the trajectory of this slide, from the start point to the end point. During the sliding process, we can control the acceleration and bouncing by tapping the screen, so that the character can fly farther.

fullData.title: Super Archer
fullData.description: You are a super archer, but you dont need to shoot arrows. In the game, you need to find companions and make alliances with them, the more allies you find, the more likely you are to win. Remember, dont go near a group larger than you.

fullData.title: Sausage Run
fullData.description: In this game, you are a sausage.You need to pass various levels, there are rotating knives, burning stoves, electric plugs, etc. You need to use skills to pass these levels and reach the end to win

fullData.title: Rolling Ball
fullData.description: The ball is coming, move the pipe and let the ball pass smoothly.

fullData.title: Help The Fish
fullData.description: Two little fish have been separated and you need to help them get back together.Pull the plug correctly and bring the two fish together to win.

fullData.title: Future Warrior
fullData.description: Become the greatest future warrior.From the stone age to the future age, you need to go through different opponents, but in the end you can beat them all.

fullData.title: Archery King
fullData.description: Tap, shoot, defeat all enemies. You are a master of archery and your mission is to defeat the enemy and reach the finish line. Start the attack!

fullData.title: Train Is Coming
fullData.description: The track is broken, you need to fix it.You goal is to fix the track and make the train go.

fullData.title: Super Soccer
fullData.description: Your goal is to shoot the ball into the goal. Pass the ball to your teammate,try to make the ball to the goal.You need to control the passing angle to avoid being intercepted by the opponent.

fullData.title: Spin The Maze
fullData.description: Spin the maze and make the ball out. There are stars in the maze, you need to collect as more stars as possible.

fullData.title: Nasty Bomb
fullData.description: The bomb is coming! You need to tap to open the box and collect fruits.Bombs are mixed with the flying furits. You need to avoid the bombs fly to the box.

fullData.title: Dig Escape
fullData.description: The dragon is coming, hurry up and run!You should dig a hole to run.You may encounter a bomb, avoid it as much as possible.

fullData.title: Dash Cat
fullData.description: Dash to catch the rolling cat.You need to draw a line to make the cat roll further.Make sure the cat doesnt fall to the ground.The ink will be used up.

fullData.title: Clever Jump
fullData.description: Tap the screen to control the length of the strut.You need to keep the bunny safe. If the pole is too short or too long, the rabbit will fall and the game will fail.

fullData.title: Skating Master
fullData.description: This is an ice skating game.You need to beat your opponent to win the game. Along the way you can collect props to help you win the game, but there will also be obstacles that slow you down.

fullData.title: Rush And Fire
fullData.description: Become a sharpshooter and defeat all enemies.Collect bullets and defeat enemies. Defeat all enemies and you will reach the final destination and complete the mission.

fullData.title: Hurricane
fullData.description: Hurricane is coming!Hurricanes will devour everything. You need to control the direction of the hurricane within the specified time, defeat as many opponents as possible, and win the game.

fullData.title: Big Eater
fullData.description: All you need to do is to fill the belly of the big eater.Tap the screen to control the timing of the bamboo stick jumping and landing. Collect more food and send it to the mouth of the big eater. Remember, consecutive clicks can jump higher.

fullData.title: Tiny War
fullData.description: There is an army on your finger.Gently swipe the screen with your hand to create an army, and follow the prompts to better defeat the enemy. Remember to keep upgrading equipment.

fullData.title: Infi Defense
fullData.description: The virus are here, beat them quickly.Combine low-level weapons into high-level weapons to have more powerful attack power. Place weapons in the right position to attack the attacking virus.

fullData.title: Booming Plant
fullData.description: Upgrade your factory to produce more stuff. You have a factory that needs to be constantly upgraded to produce more products. Produce, transport, sell, manage this factory well, and become a winner in life.

fullData.title: Best Sniper
fullData.description: You are the best sniper. You need to snipe all the zombies and protect those who are running away.

fullData.title: Shooting Star
fullData.description: Throw the basketball into the hoop.You need to control the strength and angle of your fingers to throw as many basketballs as possible into the hoop. When you reach the target score, you can pass the level.

fullData.title: Cut Master
fullData.description: Cut the rope and destroy the can.You must seize the moment and cut the rope with the bomb attached. Youre done when all cans are destroyed.

fullData.title: Crayon Pop
fullData.description: Collect more styluses to draw a rainbow line.Control the direction of the pen by swiping left and right, collect more pens to get more rewards!

fullData.title: Color Hammer
fullData.description: Hit more nails to pass the level.You need to control the direction of the hammer to hit the nails. The hammer can only hit nails of the same color, and if it hits other colors, the level may fail.

fullData.title: Billiard King
fullData.description: Your goal is to score the 8 ball.You need to score other own balls first, and finally score the black eight.Swipe left and right to control the angle, and swipe up and down to control the strength.

fullData.title: Snake Hit
fullData.description: My aim is steady! Hide behind the obstacles and shoot the other players in order progress further onto the next level. Tap when you are ready to shoot!

fullData.title: Color Crash
fullData.description: Can you settle this issue? Swipe the color balls to the edge, be careful try to swipe the balls in the same color as the edges, cause the color of the edges will keep changing. When you make a swipe with two different colors, your remaining time will be reduced. Only if you clear all the color balls within the limited time can you go to the next level.

fullData.title: Builder Run
fullData.description: Let us press on! Swipe left and right to move your builder, try to collect as many bricks as possible on your way. The bricks you collected will be used to form a bridge that can help you cross the gaps you meet. And the bricks you carry to the finals will be used to build a bigger construction.

fullData.title: Brave Archer
fullData.description: I wanna shoot something! Press on the screen and drag to move the archer,  approach the chest and you will randomly receive one booster. The archer will automatically shoot at the enemies coming toward you.

fullData.title: Wild Roll
fullData.description: No rest, keep rolling to the end! Slide left and right to control the rolling ball, collect the pieces spawned on your way, the more you collect, the bigger your ball will grow. Dodge the obstacles like deep holes and tree trunks, you can also get the magnet to attract any pieces in your eyesight to you for several seconds.

fullData.title: Roof Runner
fullData.description: Remain focused, remain swift! Slide left and right to move the runner, the obstacles on your way wont stop you but cost you some more time to pass, compared with dodging them. You can also try various skins which will bring you more fun in the roof runs.

fullData.title: Mad Eraser
fullData.description: Erase everything if you want! As per the instructions, press on the screen and swipe to erase the part of images, once you make the correct erase, you will get into the next level.

fullData.title: Harvest Story
fullData.description: Feed and plant, create your home yard! Press and drag to control your movement, you can deal with different events in different areas, you can feed chickens, plant trees, even gather honey, then you can sell your harvest for money and use them to expand your home yard.

fullData.title: City Express
fullData.description: Ready to deliver! Press and hold the screen to keep driving towards, swipe left and right to turn your direction. Try to collect as much cash as possible in your way, notice that you need to drive into the loading areas when you see them, and be careful do not crash on the roadblocks or you will restart your round.

fullData.title: Power Shooter
fullData.description: Make this free-kick as far as you can! Tap the screen at the right time to select the direction to kick the ball with this wigwagging needle. The ball will drop to the ground and bounce off, then you will get a second chance to shoot it. Collect more coins as you can in the game so that you could use them to upgrade the power, speed, elastic, even your offline income.

fullData.title: Golden Boot
fullData.description: Be the greatest shooter of all time! Drag the ball to create an aiming laser to the target then release to shoot. You can also draw an arc laser to shoot when you have to dodge over the obstacles. When there is a goalkeeper, you should catch the right timing to shoot.

fullData.title: Free Fall
fullData.description: Let the ball make free fall! Tap on the left and right to control the board to rotate, then the ball on the boards will roll and fall under the force of gravity. You also need to take quick action during the falling of the ball because you will have to change its falling path to make sure the ball drop into the recess.

fullData.title: Counting Master
fullData.description: Can you figure out this math puzzle? Choose 2 numbers to add equal to the target number, then tap on them to clear the board. When all pieces of bread with numbers are removed from the board, you will get to the next stage.

fullData.title: Clever Rescue
fullData.description: See? They are already there! Drag the rope and stick it to the pole, make sure the path is accessible, then press and hold the screen to transport the crowd from SOS spot to safety.

fullData.title: Pouring Ball
fullData.description: Press and swipe to rotate the glasses, makeing the ball fall under the force of gravity. In some stages you need to catch the ball with another glass and then pass it to another, until it fall into the final glass.

fullData.title: Open Fire
fullData.description: Press on the left pad to move and press on the right pad to aim shoot. Clear all the enemies and be the sole survivor in the battleground to win the match. Purchase weapons with coins, and merge two same weapons into one more powerful weapon.

fullData.title: Easy Charger
fullData.description: Tap the screen and use your brain, try to plug all the chargers in the boards. Sometimes you have to manage the right sockets for chargers to plug in according to their various sizes, and some other times you have to turn on some electric devices first to help you successfully plug in all chargers.

fullData.title: Copy Laser
fullData.description: Draw the correct icons which are displayed on the upcoming airships to dispatch them. Be careful do not to make the wrong draws, or your attack will miss. You can also clear more than 1 airship with the same icon in one act.

fullData.title: Block Master
fullData.description: Drag the blocks left and right, make them fall and fill the space. Blocks will be cleared when they form a full line. Your every move will randomly raise some blocks from the bottom, try to clear more blocks before they reach to the top as you can.

fullData.title: Fruits Fall
fullData.description: Join this juicy fruits festival now! Slide the laser to the position you want to drop the fruit in this transparent box,  the dropped fruits will freely fall and roll in the box. When two same fruits contact, they will merge into one bigger fruit, the more fruits you merge, the higher points you will get.

fullData.title: Rushing Rover
fullData.description: Spider Man or Ape Man? Tap the screen to throw out a rope and swing in the air by the effect of gravity and inertia force. You have to catch the right timing to tap and swing, or you may be crushed before reaching to the finish.

fullData.title: Rolling Agent
fullData.description: I am a sharp shooter, without mercy! You will play as a secret agent, when facing enemies, you will turn a somersault and shoot in the air. During this period you can aim on your enemies by laser and tap to shoot, let none survive.

fullData.title: Magic Paint
fullData.description: What you paint, what you get! Draw anything you like on the pad and you will get a pair of it as your arms, then you can use these arms carry you to the finish.

fullData.title: Super Miner
fullData.description: Manage your mine and raise your miner group, let them dig for more gold and transfer them into cash. Merge the miners, upgrade and research, achieve your great fortune from now.

fullData.title: Color Splash
fullData.description: Generate balls to bounce between the colorful circles and clear them, you can gain points by clearing these circles, then purchase more powerful balls with points, to unlock more missions.

fullData.title: Bounce Shooter
fullData.description: Drag the laser to aim and shoot the cubes, your bullets will bounce off cubes, try to get a higher score by shooting on the cubes as many times as possible.

fullData.title: Rainbow Splash
fullData.description: Such a simple and cool matching! Tap on the cubes with the same color which stay in pairs or more and clear them to get points, the more cubes you clear in a tap, the higher points you will get. Gain enough points to unlock new stages.

fullData.title: Matching Cook
fullData.description: Enjoy colorful collection of foods! Tap to link pairs of foods by dragging them. Find all pairs before thee time runs out. You can select four different modes to play: Mission, Challenge, Memory and Endless

fullData.title: Magic Painter
fullData.description: Decorate the world with your brush! Slide on the screen to draw the missing part of the picture, to make the picture looks more complete. You will consume stamina in your every painting, you can get extra stamina through watching videos.

fullData.title: Happy Tetris
fullData.description: Brand new Tetris, try it now! Drag and put the blocks in various shapes on the board, and the whole board was divided into 9 parts of same size, the blocks in each part will be cleared once the part is full of blocks. The blocks are randomly shaped but you can tap on them to rotate. The more blocks you clear, the higher points you will get.

fullData.title: Block Maze
fullData.description: You can create anything with this building blocks! Use specific blocks to form an image on the panel. Put each part into the correct position, and do not make any of them exceed the border of the panel.

fullData.title: Road Charger
fullData.description: I am moving as fast as I can! Tap left and right to turn the driving car, collect enough coins before the time runs out. Try to dodge the police cars for you will lose coins when crashing on them.

fullData.title: Iron Attack
fullData.description: Super weapon assemble, attack! Drive your tank shoot and swipe off any opponent tanks which are blocking you. Slide left and right to dodge their crush and shells. You can use coins to buy more tanks, and merge the same ones into a more advanced tank which provide more damage.

fullData.title: Fierce City
fullData.description: I always shoot first, guns blazing! Slide left and right to move, you will keep shooting at the enemies approaching you. Tap the button on the right to roll and escape from enemies attack if need. Be careful of your mag because you are unable to attack during the seconds you reload. When facing a powerful boss, you can call robots and airforce for help.

fullData.title: Bombing Time
fullData.description: Look out, fire in the hole! Throw grenades to stop and blow the upcoming enemies. You should aim at the location in front of the marching enemies, since it will take seconds for the grenades to sail through the air. Meanwhile the explosion will deal damage to an area, so try to hit as many enemies as possible at the same time.

fullData.title: Ant Run
fullData.description: Little ants burst super power! You are going to control an ant to run on a road filled with many obstacles, swipe left and right to dodge them, at the same time try to collect more ants on your way to enlarge your troops. You can also unlock more different modes after completing missions.

fullData.title: Air Brawl
fullData.description: Fly high,dominate the sky! Fly your fighter and crash any enemies which coming towards you, be careful not to be hit or shot by them. Dont forget to collect fuel or health on your way. The more planes you defeat, the higher points you will get.

fullData.title: Brain Master
fullData.description: I bet you never got a brain training like this!Here you will get a series of test, which include many different questions.You have to get your brain in gear and come up with answers. You should be aware that sometime the questions are not asked as their literal meaning express, only smart guys can figure it out!

fullData.title: Swift Rider
fullData.description: You are the outlaw rider! Tap left and right to ride your motorcycle complete every tasks, achieve enough coins by finishing tasks, and use these coins buy faster motors. No need to concern about being caught by police, speed is the only rule.

fullData.title: Melody Link
fullData.description: Feast of match and music! Tap to link the cubes in the same color and clear them, each pair you match will play a songful music, so you can be a composer by matchng the pairs.

fullData.title: Crazy Gunfight
fullData.description: Can you be the last survivor on this battleground? Commpete with others in a battleground, select a location to jump off the plane and try to gear up with the weapons randomly spawned in the map as soon as possible after you landed. Different weapons deal different damage and effect. Be aware that the area of the safety zone will become smaller as time goes by, defeat all your enemies to win the game.

fullData.title: Snake Go
fullData.description: How much do you eat if youre a snake? Tap left and right to control the snake crawl,eat the dots and dodge the cubes.The snakes bodysize will grow after he eat the dots, while he will get shorter after crushing on cubes.

fullData.title: Shark Is Coming
fullData.description: Help the pirate escape now!Tap the screen and turn left and right to keep climbing up the mast.Be careful do not crash on the obstacle boards, or you will drop off and feed the shark.You can try to collect more drumsticks on your way, and you can spend them to revive.

fullData.title: Relived Life
fullData.description: You only live once, but here we got another chance! Wanna start a completely new life? Just try this life simulator now! Here you can rearrange your career, achieve much more fortune with your effort, luck, and business talent. Dating with different lovers and purchasing massive cars or houses you like could never be such an easy thing! What are you waiting for, just start your new life now!

fullData.title: Puppy Run
fullData.description: Nobody can stop this canty puppy, help him jump to the final! The puppy will keep running towards unless you tap the screen to make puppy act, the signal will make puppy jump or turn as the different arrows instruct. You should also tap at the right timing so that your puppy wont drop off the road.

fullData.title: Crack Shot
fullData.description: As a sharpshooter, no one is allowed to survive under your muzzle. Drag to aim, release to shoot, kill all your enemies! Your bullets can penetrate the enemies standing in line, so choose an effective shooting strategy with fewer bullets. There will be various skins for you that will bring about different improvements.

fullData.title: Bubble Pop
fullData.description: Shoot on the different cubes and gain more points as you can. Drag to aim your target, and the bubbles you shoot will bounce back once they hit any of the cubes or the two sides of the wall. Try to clear the cubes with fewer shots before they rise to the upper line.

fullData.title: Super 2048
fullData.description: This puzzle takes a bit of kop. This is a math puzzle that you will find hard to stop playing. Drop the number cubes on the board, when 2 cubes with the same number touch, they merge into one. Try to merge more cubes till 2048 was created. Some items could be purchased with the coins you collect.

fullData.title: Jump Smash
fullData.description: Control the jumping ball to the bottom. Press the screen to smash the bricks, release to stop smashing and stay jumping. Only the color bricks can be smashed, and the black brick will break you if you try to smash it. Straight smashing will charge your super which can destroy any bricks for seconds.

fullData.title: Finger Cannon
fullData.description: Swipe to aim and shoot, pay attention to the falling stones, do not let them hit on you. You will get coins as rewards every time you complete a mission, and these coins could be used for upgrading your power.

fullData.title: Super Defense
fullData.description: Defend till the end! Remain alert, I will protect! Defend your castle from enemies and monsters. Manage your troops, heroes, skills and equipment to defend your castle from being attacked. Coins and gems are the two important resources that can make you more powerful. Tap to spawn the troops you want in the battle, they will behave better performance when different units fight together.

fullData.title: Mr Racer
fullData.description: Fired up and ready to serve. Pass and crash, I am in the rush! Drive your car as long-distance as possible till your fuel run out. Press the screen to keep speeding up, you can also get extra speed-up by crashing other cars. You got different goals in different modes, try to win a higher rank in challenge mode. Use coins to upgrade your racers.

fullData.title: Magic Parkour
fullData.description: The road ahead is still very long with many obstacles, you need more resources to help you overcome them. Long press to overlay stairs with the bricks you collect on the road, do not approach the red region when you marching ahead. Try to collect more bricks so that you will achieve more rewards when you reach the final.

fullData.title: Fruit Monster
fullData.description: I like fruits, both eating and killing! You won't like fruits when they are angry! Clear all the fruit monsters in the mission. Tap and hold the screen to move, shoot and dodge until you clear all the fruit monsters. Use coins to upgrade your abilities, use gems to upgrade your weapons. Go across more chapters, unlock more new weapons.

fullData.title: Frozen Magic
fullData.description: Anything can be frozen except my way! Keep cool, everything's in a flash! Help the princess go through her road. Tap to freeze the obstacles on your way, take care of the timing you freeze, make sure the frozen parts won't stop your steps. You can also collect gems on the road, freeze the rotating gems at the right time will help you collect more gems.

fullData.title: Final Battle
fullData.description: Stand with me, comrades, we shall rest when we are dead! Clear all the enemies and survive till the end. Hold the screen to control your move, you will attack your enemies when they are within your shooting range. You can upgrade your weapons to gain stronger power, even call an ally to fight with you side by side. Collecting and using some items will make it easier to complete missions and tasks.

fullData.title: Crazy Drift
fullData.description: I know your need for speed and drift, an awesome driver needs an amazing racer! Get super racers to complete more tasks! Collect gems by matching cars, the cars will be produced as time goes by. You can purchase more powerful racers, which have better performance when racing. You will receive different tasks, try to finish them to complete a mission.

fullData.title: Bullet Man
fullData.description: You could also be one of a kind! Drag to aim your enemies, and be aware that your bullet is limited, try to shoot down more enemies with fewer bullets. Make good use of the walls because your bullets bounce off when they hit the wall, and your bullets can penetrate the enemies standing in line.

fullData.title: Feed Master
fullData.description: Feed to defeat the monster, it's time to feast! Feed the monsters till they eat themselves to death. Tap the right item or food which is displayed on the screen to feed the monster. Try to feed the monster without any mistake so that you can get a Feast Time which can help you feed the monster much more quickly.

fullData.title: Crazy Kart 3D
fullData.description: Drive to the goal with your super racer! Press to go right and release to go left, collect more coins on your road, take care not to fall of the race track. The cars in your garage will make money for you, and you can assemble a better car with two same cars.

fullData.title: Splitting Cells
fullData.description: Slide to aim and shoot the upcoming cells. The numbers on the cells show the counts of shots that break them into pieces. Big cells will divide into smaller cells, take care not to be hit by them. You can also collect different buffs from smashing the cells, which will bring you great power-up.

fullData.title: Traffic Run
fullData.description: If you are looking for a driving casual game, Traffic Run is the game you are looking for. Driving requires attention and askill. So with the help of your reflexes, try to reach the finish line without hitting other vehicles and collect gold coins. Be careful not to hit the other cars. This fun game will offer you a nice gaming experience.

fullData.title: Crazy Hammer
fullData.description: Walk around and smash your enemies whie in the arena. You are in the wilderness, with your choise of weapon a hammer - fight for your survival! There is only room for one hammer master!

fullData.title: Traffic Passing
fullData.description: Want to satisfy your challenge seeking, and make it really satisfying challenge. The ultimate Traffic Passing game is here! Think outside the box and youll be expert of the game. Try this addicitve game and train your mind to solve each level, prove that ou are the smartest champion.

fullData.title: Pipe Puzzle
fullData.description: Ready to train your brain and put your logical skills to the test? Play TapMyWater now! With different type of blocks, you get to really enhance your logical skills. All you need to do is slide block pipes, connect them and make water paths. Easy to play and get addicted while playing this connect water pipe puzzle game.

fullData.title: Archers King
fullData.description: Entering the surfing world with a twist of archery. Begin your amazing journey of surfing trough the waves and shooting down your enemies. Shoot as many and as quickly as you can, before they shoot you down. With the coins you earn you can purchase, different arrow upgrades during gameplay in order to score as many points as possible.

fullData.title: Ball Is Coming
fullData.description: Ready to shoot some hoops? Grab a ball and start dunking! BallsComing is a hot action game that anybody can enjoy! Instead of shooting the hoops however, you get to draw a line and make the ball reach the hoop without shooting it.

fullData.title: 8 Ball King
fullData.description: The main objective of the game is that you outbeat your opponent by pocketing all of your chosen balls, and win the game. You can either play against the computer or a friend.

fullData.title: My Bowling 3D
fullData.description: The objecitve of the game is to roll the ball and knock over the other oponents pin. Knocking over a pin scores one point. Knocking all 5x or 10x pins scores you 5 or 10 points (strike). If playing against the computer, you can choose the difficulty from easy, medium and hard. You can also choose how many pins to have 5 or 10. Or you can also play against a friend.

fullData.title: Hungry Monster
fullData.description: The main objective of the game is to feed the monster, by going all the way into enemy lines and grabbing the egg, then going back by avoiding the given obstacles to feed the big monster.

fullData.title: Plant Beat Zombies
fullData.description: Plant Beat Zombies, a 2D casual player version of plants vs zombies - purchase the desired plant. Upgrade them by merging them together and kill of the dropping zombies from the sky.

fullData.title: Fill The Glass
fullData.description: The glass is empty. Your Job is to draw a line to make the glass filled up with liquid.

fullData.title: Tower Defense X
fullData.description: Defend your homeland, you are going to build the last shield! Drag to plant the selected weapons on the specific land. You will get coins from every enemy you killed, then use the coins to upgrade your weapons and strengthen your power. Some super is also provided in case you come across plenty of creeps rushing to you.

fullData.title: Super Golf
fullData.description: This could be the best golf simulator ever! Tap the screen when the arrow stops at the center. You will swing a lob shot first, and try to keep the ball in the green area, so that you will have another chance to chip in. You can also use cash to upgrade your abilities, which will help you make a better performance and get more cash rewards.

fullData.title: Sky Running 3D
fullData.description: Finish the race before your opponents do. Hold and drag to change the direction of where you are going to.

fullData.title: Pet Run
fullData.description: Match the coloured boxes, until the pets start showing up, match the pets and progress further in the game. The game relies on logical and time skills.

fullData.title: Mr Bullet
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to kill off the bandits. Aim by holding and dragging your pointer to the desired trajectory in order to kill off the bandits. With each level completed you earn cash, with that cash you can purchase different types of skins and firearms.

fullData.title: Merge And Defense
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to defend the egg from the upcoming enemies, and progress into the next levels. Merge two of the same characters by dragging them on top of each other to build up a stronger character. Fight off waves of  bugs and take down bosses to unlock new cards and abilities. Take a break and watch your cute characters do all the work for you while you are away. Come back to see your progress and claim your idle earnings.

fullData.title: Mahjong Link 3D
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to get rid of all the cubes, by connecting two of the same blocks together before the timer runs out. You cannot select a block that is covered by all sides with a block that is uncovered. Both of the blocks need to be free by at least 3 of its sides!

fullData.title: Jumping Monkey
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to get the monkey to the bottom. By holding onto the screen and moving, in order to get the monkey to fit in between the leaves. Miss as many as possible levels to make the monkey powerful enough to crush the leafs if you miss the gap.

fullData.title: Fever Racing
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to get the highest score possible. By tapping and holding, along with sliding around the screen to steer the vehicle. Maneuver your way around the other cars, follow the green arrow to collect different abilities to defend yourself and continue to rank up the score.

fullData.title: Crazy Train 3D
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible, by going through the map, making stunts and collecting carts to achieve combo points. Tap and hold to increase the speed of your train.

fullData.title: Crazy Portal
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to get rid of all the bandits and collect the stars along the way. By aiming with sliding and taping to shoot the first blue portal, which creates the start for the object to go through. Where the second yellow bullet is set to the desired trajectory to collect the stars and kill the bandit.

fullData.title: Amazing Road
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to connect the green ball to the green circle. By sliding to the desired direction it will move. When a two-way street comes along, slide towards the most likely one to be the way. Collect all the stars to reach 200 and win the game.

fullData.title: Zoo Blast
fullData.description: Collect the given animals. Tap on the block containing the selected animal but they must be 2 or more of the same animals together, in order to collect them all. Combine certain sets of blocks to unlock power ups..

fullData.title: Zombie Survival
fullData.description: Kill off the other zombies by moving around the map, kill them to collect gold and level up your weapons, to progress in the game.

fullData.title: Twisty Road
fullData.description: Put the pink cube into place, by either swiping left or right in order to build the road and let the ball pass.

fullData.title: Defense Tower
fullData.description: Defend the treasurer from the enemies, by building towers. Drag and drop tow of the same level towers to upgrade into a better tower. Complete quests to receive gold and strengthen your capabilities to improve your game.

fullData.title: Transform
fullData.description: Tap and slide to change into the shape required for you to pass through.

fullData.title: Stickman Vs Zombies
fullData.description: Tap and slide on the screen to kill off the rest of the zombies, and pass the level.

fullData.title: Shoot Smash
fullData.description: Tap on the shooting cannon, to smash the fruit. Upgrade your weapons and increase your ammo, to progress onto the next level.

fullData.title: Mining Master
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to destroy the given stones, and move along the next level. Hold and drag along, to let the miner throw his pickaxe to destroy the stones. Watch out for the stones to not hit you because you will die. You can purchase upgrades for your pickaxe and throwing speed, in order to be more efficient.

fullData.title: Merge Kill
fullData.description: Slide around to find characters to kill. Kill as many heros as possible to win coins and pass the level. Use the coins to upgrade your weapons, merge two of the same heros to upgrade into a stronger hero and kill the others.

fullData.title: Merge Guns 3D
fullData.description: Prove you are a better shooter by shooting down all the targets. Select your prize. Merge the guns to create an improved version of your gun, and progress further in the game.

fullData.title: Hi Taxi
fullData.description: Tap on to speed up and collect the customer, and drop him off at his final destination.

fullData.title: Death Run
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to kill off the contestants the moment they are all on the killing areas by tapping on the screen, in order to progress onto the next level.

fullData.title: Crazy Moto
fullData.description: Objective of the game is to finish the race first. Tap on the screen to speed up, collect weapons and abilities to knock the others off their bikes. Upgrade your motorbike, and props, to improve your racing abilities. Unlock maps by completing tasks and races. Login daily to receive amazing rewards.

fullData.title: Block Gun 3D
fullData.description: Hold to shoot, place your target on the enemy and let go. Upgrade your weapons, helmet and armor to level up. Choose between different modes depending on your desired play.

fullData.title: Ace Man
fullData.description: Tap on and hold until your preferred power has been reached, release and ace! You have scored into the hole.

fullData.title: Solitaire Classic
fullData.description: The main objective of the game is to release and, play in position in sequence from ace through king to collect all four suits. Patience is the key to winning this game!

fullData.title: Shooting Cubes
fullData.description: Aim and shoot at the cubes, to fully clear out the mainfield.

fullData.title: Hill Racing
fullData.description: Control the vehicle and climb over the hills. Timing is very important. If the car does not overturn, the car may be destroyed or killed. Are you ready to go?

fullData.title: Crazy Knife
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to slice up all vegetables by tapping on the screen, and reach the end. Try to avoid slicing on the wooden or iron plates, as it makes you lose your streak and slows you down.

fullData.title: Big Sword
fullData.description: Tap along the screen, to move your character by avoiding the bullets, slice up your enemies and reach the finish line.

fullData.title: Table Tennis Championship
fullData.description: Table tennis could never be so easy! Everyone is master here! Press to hold the racket, catch the moment to block and strike back, you can also draw a curve on the screen to make a rotating ball which make  your opponent harder to chase.

fullData.title: Soccer Hero
fullData.description: Shoot and score, you are the player of all! Get more points as you can within limited chances. Tap to shoot, swipe to control its target, you can also drag a curve to let the ball cross the wall set by defenders, also be aware of the goalkeeper, he is very swift.

fullData.title: Save The Pets
fullData.description: Tap on, to create the desired length for the bridge, move on the buildings and save the pets. You can switch between your pets that you have acquired or roles.

fullData.title: Let Me In
fullData.description: Collect as many people as possible, by tapping and holding to collect all. Upgrade your vehicle, to increase stability and load of people.

fullData.title: Help The Zombie
fullData.description: Tap on the arrows to make the box turn and make the zombie fall down onto the target, by converting the human into a zombie. Try to get three stars in the desired moves.

fullData.title: Crazy Bomb
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to get rid of all the boxes off the platform. You have to substitute the boxes with the required explosives you think is best to get rid of all the boxes. By tapping on the desired box and tap again on the desired dynamite. Each bomb has its different abilities, once you think you are done tap on the bomb starter.

fullData.title: Batter King
fullData.description: Batter King is the game where you can really showcase your cricket skills, the moment the target of the ball is green. Use the keys or tap to hit the ball, and score. The ultimate goal of the game is to score as many points as you can!

fullData.title: Piano Keys
fullData.description: Tap the black keys before they disappear to pass onto the next level. Tap on the red hearts to collect, to give yourself a second life. You can browse from a selection of songs.

fullData.title: Archery Master
fullData.description: Showcase your aiming skills, by choosing two different game modes. You can either choose story mode and compete in the tournaments, or free mode and train your aim. To shoot you need to tap, hold and move the bow - so the crosshair is at the target. Watch the direction of the wind as it plays a major role in your arrow's trajectory. Release when you think is best and receive your score. Aim to score higher, in order to achieve the gold medal.

fullData.title: Pets Match
fullData.description: Find three or more identical squares in a row and eliminate them. Dont let the square top the top of the screen. There will be magical props to help you.

fullData.title: Knife
fullData.description: Swipe around and aim at the enemies, before the map closes down on you. Upgrade your skills and weapons to increase the chances of you winning the game.

fullData.title: Gun Shooter
fullData.description: Like playing softball but online, hide behind the obstacles and shoot the other players in order progress further onto the next level. Tap when you are ready to shoot!

fullData.title: Color Ball 3D
fullData.description: Tap along to change the direction of the ball, once the ball on the map changes colour collect the specified ball colours.

fullData.title: Anipop Link
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to fill out the entire map by dragging the animal to the corresponding balls to pass the stage. Try to save steps, in order to use them into more difficult stages of the game.

fullData.title: Golden Glove
fullData.description: Are you a catcher, choose your favourite sports team and demonstrate your skills by sliding your finger or mouse along the screen to catch the ball.

fullData.title: Kill All Zombies
fullData.description: The main objective is to kill all the zombies, by moving forward and shoving the zombies off the top of the building to move onto the next, and get to the helicopter. You can upgrade your character, weapons.

fullData.title: Fly Pass
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to get the ball through the hoop, by tapping and making the hoop go into the direction of the ball. Try to get at least 5 points before your opponent gets any, and before the timer runs out. Claim your rewards and unlock special deals.

fullData.title: Bumble Shooter
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to get rid of all the bubbles and reach the desired score, to continue onto the next level. With the given bubble aim and tap to shoot at the colored set of bubbles to pop them all. To skip all the bubbles aim to clear a path and snap the bubble with the star, which will give you a huge amount of points and progress you onto the next level.

fullData.title: Bullet Master 3D
fullData.description: Tap on the aim of the enemies to kill them off. Choose a different weapon, or character. Reload the guns by scrolling down.

fullData.title: Fire The Gun
fullData.description: When aiming at the range, tap on the yellow button to shoot and gain the most points by hitting the bullseye. Buy more weapons and merge the same two weapons to create a greater weapon.

fullData.title: Bubble Blast
fullData.description: The aim of the game is to get rid of all the bubbles that are stuck on the pillar before they reach the bottom. Match the given colored bubble to any 2+ of the same colour to pop them and reduce the bubbles. By sliding to look around the tower, and tapping to shoot the bubble at its given trajectory. You can tap on an angle or straight in order to match with the rest of the bubbles. Being patient here is the key, along with using the right strategic movements.

fullData.title: Board The Train
fullData.description: The objective of the game is to collect all the passengers, and go through the map and its obstacles, to reach the final destination. You play by tapping and holding on the screen.
